## ExtensionManager.onTransaction() method

A handler which allows the extension to respond to each transaction without needing to register a plugin.

This is currently used in the collaboration plugin.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onTransaction(params: OnTransactionManagerParams): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>OnTransactionManagerParams</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
